name: Maria Chriseth A. Cruz
bio: Ms. Maria Chriseth A. Cruz is a dedicated virtual operations expert with more than a decade of experience supporting CEOs and entrepreneurs in scaling their businesses. With a strong background in executive assistance, customer success, and back-office management, she has helped streamline operations for companies in healthcare, e-commerce, SaaS companies and techâ€”including managing client support teams, optimizing workflows, and leading virtual teams. Her commitment to HIPAA-compliant processes and her proactive, solutions-oriented approach make her an invaluable partner for dental practice owners looking to eliminate administrative chaos and refocus on patient care.
